description.text:
Something seems to be amiss. 
The  $(b;winter)Winter Fey $() are restless, let me find out whats going on.

Oh no...something terrible has happened!
The $(b;spring)Electra $() have been stolen from the  $(b;summer)Summer Court $()!
It's a Ceremonial Item representing the dominant Court, the  $(b;summer)Summer Court $() have been in possession of it for...- the pixie thinks deeply â€“ A very long time!

An  $(b;winter)Enderman $() of the  $(b;winter)Shadow Court $() stole it!?
But I thought the shadow court was a fairy tale. 
Made up to scare misbehaving spring Pixies!
They are real? That's so scary!

The  $(b;summer)Summer Court $() will put everything to get it back, but I bet you the  $(b;winter)Winter Court $() will want to have the Electra for their own! 

You would like to know more about the shadow Court?
Let's go back to the  $(b;spring)library $() and see if the librarian knows anything about them?
